featured_storytellers.name: Amara Kikwete
featured_storytellers.title: Traditional Wisdom Keeper
featured_storytellers.bio: Amara preserves centuries-old Maasai and Swahili oral traditions, sharing stories passed down through generations under the African sky.

featured_storytellers.name: Kemi Adebayo
featured_storytellers.title: Urban Culture Chronicler
featured_storytellers.bio: From the bustling streets of Lagos, Kemi bridges traditional Yoruba culture with modern African creativity and innovation.

featured_storytellers.name: Ahmed Ould Mahmoud
featured_storytellers.title: Desert Historian
featured_storytellers.bio: Ahmed carries the stories of ancient caravan routes and the wisdom of desert nomads across the vast Sahara.

featured_storytellers.name: Hery Rasolofo
featured_storytellers.title: Island Naturalist
featured_storytellers.bio: Hery shares the unique biodiversity stories of Madagascar, home to species found nowhere else on Earth.

featured_storytellers.name: Akosua Mensah
featured_storytellers.title: Cultural Heritage Weaver
featured_storytellers.bio: Akosua weaves together the rich tapestry of Ghanaian culture, from ancient kingdoms to modern resilience.

featured_storytellers.name: Dr. Fatima Mbeki
featured_storytellers.title: Conservation Scientist
featured_storytellers.bio: Dr. Mbeki combines scientific research with storytelling to share the urgent stories of African wildlife conservation.
